description: Microsoft Edge Version Check is a tool that allows users to quickly confirm the version of their Microsoft Edge browser they are running. To check the version, users need to click on the three dots located at the upper right corner of the Edge window and select 'Help and Feedback.' Then, by clicking on 'About Microsoft Edge,' the current version information will be displayed. This tool ensures that users are aware of whether they are using the latest version of Microsoft Edge, which addresses vulnerabilities such as CVE-2023-6510. Keeping your browser updated is essential for maintaining security, and this quick check can help identify any outdated versions that may still be vulnerable. For more detailed information on the latest versions and security updates, users should refer to the Microsoft Edge release notes.
